actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide loans to nursing homes to enable them to obtain fire protection equipment in order to comply with the Life Safety Code of the National Fire Protection Association.

summary.text: Provides, under the Small Business Act, loans to nursing homes to enable them to obtain fire protection equipment in order to comply with the Life Safety Code of the National Fire Protection Association.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide loans to nursing homes to enable them to obtain fire protection equipment in order to comply with the Life Safety Code of the National Fire Protection Association.
